game.name: Devi5e: FEARS
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Devi5e: Fears is a psychological horror game. You play as Diti who is now exploring a convenient store where she has to face the fears of someone else's past experiences. Gather answers regarding incidents that took place which were deemed inhuman or even supernatural.
